TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed WorkflowInstanceState extends System.Enum

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceState Aborted = int32(3)

remarks.format: ## Remarks The workflow instance will be in this state after M:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Abort?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True has been called. A workflow in this state is capable of being resumed using M:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Run?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceState Complete = int32(2)

remarks.format: ## Remarks A workflow in this state has exited, and its P:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Completed?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True or E:System.Activities.WorkflowInvoker.InvokeCompleted?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True event has executed.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceState Idle = int32(0)

remarks.format: ## Remarks A workflow in this state is waiting on an incoming event, such as when executing a T:System.Activities.Statements.Pick?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True activity, or is waiting for the expiration of a timeout, such as when executing a T:System.Activities.Statements.Delay?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True activity.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceState Runnable = int32(1)

remarks.format: ## Remarks A workflow in this state has been created, but M:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Run?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True has not been called.
